metadata.Title: CVE-2022-0667 on Ubuntu 21.10 (impish) - medium.
metadata.Description:
When the vulnerability is triggered the BIND process will exit. BIND 9.18.0

Update Instructions:

Run `sudo ua fix CVE-2022-0667` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
by updating your system to the following package versions:

bind9 - 1:9.16.15-1ubuntu1.1
bind9-dnsutils - 1:9.16.15-1ubuntu1.1
bind9-host - 1:9.16.15-1ubuntu1.1
bind9-libs - 1:9.16.15-1ubuntu1.1
bind9-utils - 1:9.16.15-1ubuntu1.1
bind9utils - 1:9.16.15-1ubuntu1.1
dnsutils - 1:9.16.15-1ubuntu1.1
No subscription required

criterions.comment: bind9 package in impish, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '1:9.16.15-1ubuntu1.1').
